subject: Re: [junit] Eclipse Plugin update?
msgSnippet: You can install a new jar in your project s classpath, and remove the JUNIT_PATH element.  However, Kent and I were talking just Monday night about the fact
messageBody:
You can install a new jar in your project's classpath, and remove the
JUNIT_PATH element. However, Kent and I were talking just Monday
night about the fact that we end up coding on the latest version of
JUnit, but supporting, mostly, whatever last shipped with Eclipse. So
suggestions on how to most easily enable Eclipse users to stay up to
date are most welcome.

David Saff

On Wed, Jul 22, 2009 at 9:43 AM, Malte
Finsterwalder<malte@...> wrote:
> Hi,
>
> Eclipse is shipped with JUnit.
> What is the right way to update the underlying junit-version?
> Is there an update site?
